SCRIPT.MSCRI:
! Run book to run the Dimensions CM ACDWS command through the DMCLI. @echo off :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_DIMENSIONS.PRV.INCLUDE.ACDWS_LOGGING_PARAMS
! Trim parameters :SET &UC4RB_DMC_USERNAME# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DMC_USERNAME#) :SET &UC4RB_DMC_HOST# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DMC_HOST#) :SET &UC4RB_DMC_DBNAME# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DMC_DBNAME#) :SET &UC4RB_DMC_DSN# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DMC_DSN#) :SET &UC4RB_DMC_ACDWS_REQUEST_ID# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DMC_ACDWS_REQUEST_ID#) :SET &UC4RB_DMC_ACDWS_DIR_FILTER# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DMC_ACDWS_DIR_FILTER#) :SET &UC4RB_DMC_ACDWS_WORKSET# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DMC_ACDWS_WORKSET#) :SET &UC4RB_DMC_ACDWS_ARGS# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DMC_ACDWS_ARGS#)
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_DIMENSIONS.PRV.JOBI.CONNECTION@WINDOWS
! Ensure a request ID has been specified : IF &UC4RB_DMC_ACDWS_REQUEST_ID#='' : P 'Specify a request ID' : EXIT 1 : ENDIF
! Check if a directory filter has been specified : SET &FILTER#='' : IF &UC4RB_DMC_ACDWS_DIR_FILTER#<>'' : SET &FIILTER#='/DIRECTORY=\\"""&UC4RB_DMC_ACDWS_DIR_FILTER#\\"""' : ENDIF
! Check if workset has been specified : SET &WORKSET#='' : IF &UC4RB_DMC_ACDWS_WORKSET#<>'' : SET &WORKSET#='/WORKSET=\\"""&UC4RB_DMC_ACDWS_WORKSET#\\"""' : ENDIF
&UC4RB_DMC_CMD# ACDWS &UC4RB_DMC_ACDWS_REQUEST_ID# &WORKSET# &FIILTER# &UC4RB_DMC_ACDWS_ARGS# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
